channel.title: Please, I need HELP!
channel.description: I have just finally finished my first server. Now what I need is to learn is to make myself a staff member. I am using a Z508 source and when I switch the 0 in the notepad from my character mainsave to a 1 or 2 it resets my account and leaves numbers and squares. And I cannot find Client.Java in my source. PLEASE I NEED HELP :confused:

item.title: Please, I need HELP!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“I Am Me I, post:4, topic:292040”][quote author=Lemonhead443 link=topic=385873.msg2892996#msg2892996 date=1249014472]
ok the first thing you need is a new source. look below for normal rights

  1. mod 
  2.admin.
  3.owner
  4.hidden admin.

[/quote]

It’s not a 317 >.> only 2 player rights, 1 = mod, 2 = admin

go to your login protocall and search for 2;

and it has usernames there and edit it to yours.[/quote]

no, there’s no such thing as ‘owner’ rights in any version.

anyway, this topic is 2 weeks old, so I think i’ll lock it.

Read full topic

item.title: Please, I need HELP!
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Me_I I Am Me I
item.description:
@I_Am_Me_I wrote:

[quote=“Lemonhead443, post:2, topic:292040”]ok the first thing you need is a new source. look below for normal rights

  1. mod 
  2.admin.
  3.owner
  4.hidden admin.[/quote]

It’s not a 317 >.> only 2 player rights, 1 = mod, 2 = admin

go to your login protocall and search for 2;

and it has usernames there and edit it to yours.

Read full topic
